data.Description: No annual fee and an initial 3 month interest free on purchases. Ideal for businesses that have occasional cash flow needs such as start-ups or those new to credit cards
data.KeyFeatures: Managing a business means looking after the pounds and pence, that’s why we’ve designed Barclaycard Flex credit card to help. It comes with: no annual card fee, 24.9% Purchase Interest Rate, an initial 3 months' interest-free purchase period and up to 56 days interest free after the initial 3 month period. To keep your 0% rate, just make sure you stay within your credit limit and make at least your minimum payment on time each month. It’s also important that you clear your balance in full after the interest-free period ends, or you’ll be charged interest.

CommercialCreditCardItem.RepaymentNotes: Interest, default fees or account fees added since the last statement plus 1% of the remaining statement balance (min £5  or the full balance if less than £5)

Eligibility.Description: Business is not bankrupt or in bankruptcy proceedings. Existing financial commitments are not overdue and have been managed well over the last 12 months. UK based businesses only. Directors and employees must be at least 18 years of age.
Eligibility.IncomeCondition: Business turnover or new business plan must exceed £10,000 per year

BenefitDetail.BenefitDescription: No annual fee charged on the account or at card level.

BenefitDetail.BenefitName: 3 Months Interest Free at Account Inception
BenefitDetail.BenefitDescription: 3 months interest free on purchases when the account is opened. Minimum monthly payments are still required.

Ability to move money from card credit limit to Bank account. A fee is charged and the transferred balance then becomes interest free for 3 months. Available to customers on a promotional basis. Subject to status, qualification criteria and banking at Barclays.

Ability to select a further interest free period for purchases. A fee is charged with new purchases interest free for 3 months. Available to customers on a promotional basis. Subject to status, qualification criteria and banking at Barclays.
A series of discounts and offers available from participating merchants made available to card holders.
View statements, transactions, credit limits. Make payments and download management reports.
Customise card acceptance for employees, instantly turn cards, international spending, cash and online spends  on and off and preselect merchant category spends for individuals.

data.Description: No annual fee for the first year, then annual fee waived thereafter based on spend criteria. Initial 6 month interest free period on purchases plus insurance and added protection services.
data.KeyFeatures: With no annual fee for the first 12 months, the Barclaycard Select credit card can help manage cash flow and expenses. It comes with: you could pay no annual fee every year if you qualify for our Fee Waiver,19.9% Purchase Interest Rate, an initial 6-months interest free purchase period, up to 56 days interest free after the initial 6 month period. To keep your 0% rate, just make sure you stay within your credit limit and make at least your minimum payment on time each month. It’s also important that you clear your balance in full after the interest-free period ends, or you’ll be charged interest. Plus insurances and added protection for your business - Cardholder Misuse and Purchase Protection. Limitations and exclustions apply

CommercialCreditCardItem.AnnualAccountFeeType: £32 per card (waived if annual spend greater than £6,000, across whole account)
CommercialCreditCardItem.RepaymentNotes: Interest, default fees or account fees added since the last statement plus 1% of the remaining statement balance (min £5  or the full balance if less than £5)

Eligibility.Description: Business is not bankrupt or in bankruptcy proceedings. Existing financial commitments are not overdue and have been managed well over the last 12 months. UK based businesses only. Directors and employees must be at least 18 years of age.
Eligibility.IncomeCondition: Business turnover or new business plan must exceed £10,000 per year

BenefitDetail.BenefitDescription: Annual Fee waived if combined account spend is greater than £6,000 annually.

BenefitDetail.BenefitName: 6 Months Interest Free at Account Inception
BenefitDetail.BenefitDescription: 6 months interest free on purchases when the account is opened. Minimum monthly payments are still required.

Ability to move money from card credit limit to Bank account. A fee is charged and the transferred balance then becomes interest free for 3 months. Available to customers on a promotional basis. Subject to status, qualification criteria and banking at Barclays.

Ability to select a further interest free period for purchases. A fee is charged with new purchases interest free for 3 months. Available to customers on a promotional basis. Subject to status, qualification criteria and banking at Barclays.

data.Description: Provides Cashback on business purchases, enhanced travel insurance, airport lounge access and savings on foreign exchange rates
data.KeyFeatures: When you travel abroad on business, it’s good to know you’re covered for almost any eventuality. But travel insurance can be expensive. So why not save money with our enhanced travel insurance option, which costs just £100 a year for your first card, and then just £75 per card, per year for additional cards. It comes with: 14.9% Purchase Interest Rate, an initial 6-months interest free purchase period, up to 56 days interest free after the initial 6 month period. To keep your 0% rate, just make sure you stay within your credit limit and make at least your minimum payment on time each month. It’s also important that you clear your balance in full after the interest-free period ends, or you’ll be charged interest. 0.5% cashback on purchases, £400 max per year. Save 2% on foreign exchange fees. Membership of Priority Pass VIP Airport lounge with first two visits included per year. Additional visits £15 each. Plus insurances and added protection for your business - Enhanced Travel, Cardholder Misuse and Purchase Protection. Limitations and exclustions apply
